data.title: New pictures show Great Barrier Reef is not repairing itself as it should

Paedophiles to face chemical castration and possibly execution under Indonesia's brutal new laws: The new laws follow outcry over the rape and murder of a 14-year-old girl on her way home from school in April
"Extremely rare" fossils from a swordfish-like creature which lived 100 million years ago have been discovered in the Australian outback.
Cave art as much as 14,500 years old has been pronounced "the most spectacular and impressive" ever discovered on the Iberian peninsula.
25,000 Muslims gather in Toronto condemning Extremism.

Scientists discover 100s of ancient footprints in Tanzania — Likely made by men, women, & children 19,000-10,000 yrs ago. Some were walking, some jogging. “For people who work in prehistory, it’s incredibly rare to get that kind of snapshot in time.”

Pakistan ranked fourth most unsafe country in the world

Mercedes autonomous cars will protect occupants before pedestrians

Hundreds of children who were sexually and physically abused over several decades at the Domspatzen, a world-famous Catholic choir in Bavaria, will be financially compensated

Scientists plan to create 'Asgardia' nation state in space as a new Switzerland
